title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 27.1 - Purchases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 27.1 - Purchases

State Regulations
A holder of an IAP permit shall not purchase or agree to
purchase any alcohol from any person who is not duly licensed to sell or
distribute alcohol at the time of such agreement and sale. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
27.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
